sentences.en: As with ordinary light, laser range measurements to satellites are not troubled by ionospheric refraction.
sentences.cn: 用激光测人造卫星的距离和用普通光一样, 不受电离层折射的干扰.

sentences.en: Crystal to raise living atmosphere, refraction fantastic luster, it is warm.
sentences.cn: 水晶能够提升生活氛围, 折射梦幻般的光泽, 令人感到温暖.

sentences.en: If a refraction or a reflecting body is irreqular, the wave front undergoes a deformation.
sentences.cn: 如果折射体或反射体是不规则的, 波前即产生变形.

sentences.en: If water had a negative index of refraction, then a straw placed in a glass would appear to bend back under itself.
sentences.cn: 如果水具有负折射率，那么放在玻璃杯中的吸管似乎可能弯曲到自身下方。

sentences.en: Its origin is required of refraction or reflection of the light by atmospheric ice crystals.
sentences.cn: 它是由大气的冰晶对光的折射或反射所产生的.

sentences.en: Measurements included cycloplegic refraction , biometric axial length and optic disc stereo - photographs.
sentences.cn: 测量其屈光度 、 眼轴长及视神经之立体相片.

sentences.en: Over water the diurnal change in refraction is likely to be small.
sentences.cn: 在水面上,折光的周日变化可能是很小的.

sentences.en: Rapidly changing refraction due to turbulence along the line of sight affects different colors of light by different amounts and generally produces a twinkling effect for stars.
sentences.cn: 由于湍流而快速变化的折射在视线中会影响到光的不同颜色，这种影响也各不相同，一般会给恒星产生一种闪烁的效果。

sentences.en: Real estate market information asymmetry problem refraction standardized system is very important!
sentences.cn: 房价问题折射楼市信息不对称规范系统很重要!

sentences.en: Refraction has been dealt with on page 156.
sentences.cn: 折射已经在前面156页谈过.

sentences.en: Refraction is often applied as a reconnaissance tool in newly explored areas.
sentences.cn: 折射波法在新的勘探地区,通常都作为一种普查手段.

sentences.en: The bending of the light rays is caused by refraction.
sentences.cn: 光线的弯曲是由折射造成的.

sentences.en: The rainbow looks curved. These are some examples of light refraction.
sentences.cn: 彩虹看起来是弯曲的.这是一些光的折射的例子.

sentences.en: The sonobuoy permits recording a refraction profile with only one ship.
sentences.cn: 声纳浮标允许只以一艘船来记录折射剖面.

sentences.en: This is a very good light refraction type of puzzle mobile games.
sentences.cn: 这是一款非常不错的光线折射类型的益智手机游戏.

sentences.en: Water waves approaching a sloping beach provide us a conspicuous illustration of the phenomenon of refraction.
sentences.cn: 向倾斜着的海滩接近的水波为我们提供了一幅明显的折射图像.

sentences.en: We did work in thermonuclear energy, laser beam refraction, hydrogen molecule development, and heavy - water computer data.
sentences.cn: 我们从事过热核能 、 激光束折射, 氛分子发展和电脑重水数据的研究工作.

sentences.en: With all that reflection and refraction, modernism creates the illusion that there is an illusion when in fact it is a straightforward statement of money and power.
sentences.cn: 通过反射和折射，现代主义创造了一个幻觉存在的假象，而实际上它是对金钱和权力不加掩饰的声明。
